amendment.description: Amendment provides $500 million in Community Development Block Grant funding for disaster relief to communities affected by flooding in the upper midwest and other disasters in fiscal year 1997.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in House Rpt. 105-97 to appropriate $500 million in additional funding for the Community Development Block Grants program. The amendment would reduce funding for the Federal Emergency Management Agency by a comparable amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thune amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
